column4: Building a structure that is the tallest in the world is a big message for the whole world, our friends and enemies alike will be amazed at our achievement.

A revenue service ensures that people pay their taxes and pay them on time, many say that this stands to hurt the middle and low class more but others say otherwise, no matter, our nation needs this agency to secure the government's taxes.

Offering classes for anyone on how to pay taxes and everything that concerns that is very important, This ensures everyone and most importantly the youth know to how pay taxes and can avoid any issues by doing it incorrectly.
A PPF Short for (P)andemic (P)reparation (F)und is used to safeguard civilians and government officials from diseases that endanger our nation.
Providing animal shelters gives stray animals or animals in-need a temporary home where they get fed, washed, and trained.

Funding and operating an Animal control service or agancy will allow animal control officers to handle wild, dangerous, and or animals in-need of help and either put them down, or take them to an animal shelter or other holding facility.
State built and managed orphanages provide a home for orphans and homeless minors that are in-need of help and care.
The better training we give our officers the better they preform!
Interest Rates influnce many acpects of our economy, higher interest rates are generaly bad for most people, while a lower one hurts our banks.
